name: Christmas Stick Man Tap Line dodge Games for kids
name_original: Christmas Stick Man Tap Line dodge Games for kids
description:
Christmas Stick Man Tap Line pigeon Games for kids is a fun and addictive game. The game is both easy and difficult, and totally made users crazy and addicted. Agent Stickman needs your help to run and jump, but make sure you avoid the blades. The gameplay is similar to doodle jump, but its better.
Download NOW and challenge your friends. You can play it in every free moment. In this fast paced platform running platform game, your goal is to rise as high as you
can while avoiding killer blades. Keep Agent Stickman alive as long as possible. You will be amazed by the gorgeous graphics, rich gameplay, immersive music and the insanely addictive quality of this game.
***WARNING: HIGHLY ADDICTIVE***
Download today to beat your friends, while its still 100% free!
***CONSTANT CHALLENGES AND ENDLESS FUN***
